tags: wanted to make sure people saw that they responded
summary: That was fast (and also I appreciate this about them - the listening): [screenshot from CriticalRole Twitter account: “Many of...
body:
That was fast (and also I appreciate this about them - the listening):

[screenshot from CriticalRole Twitter account: “Many of you commented on Beau’s skin tone on our new Mighty Nein art print. The art prints that will be available for pre-order in our online shop on 1/31 will be corrected to be more in-line with her original artwork. Thank you, as always, for using your voice. <3″

reblog.comment:
That was fast (and also I appreciate this about them - the listening):

[screenshot from CriticalRole Twitter account: “Many of you commented on Beau’s skin tone on our new Mighty Nein art print. The art prints that will be available for pre-order in our online shop on 1/31 will be corrected to be more in-line with her original artwork. Thank you, as always, for using your voice. <3″

trail.content_raw:
That was fast (and also I appreciate this about them - the listening):

[screenshot from CriticalRole Twitter account: “Many of you commented on Beau’s skin tone on our new Mighty Nein art print. The art prints that will be available for pre-order in our online shop on 1/31 will be corrected to be more in-line with her original artwork. Thank you, as always, for using your voice. <3″
trail.content:
That was fast (and also I appreciate this about them - the listening):

[screenshot from CriticalRole Twitter account: “Many of you commented on Beau’s skin tone on our new Mighty Nein art print. The art prints that will be available for pre-order in our online shop on 1/31 will be corrected to be more in-line with her original artwork. Thank you, as always, for using your voice. <3″

summary: I can’t remember if this was discussed at the time but maybe you will ormid hoss (totally not how you spell his name but he’s...
question: I can’t remember if this was discussed at the time but maybe you will ormid hoss (totally not how you spell his name but he’s soltryce academy dude with Trent and had a conversation with Beau and Yasha) I rewatched that part recently and the way matt described him makes me think he is an aasimar “eyes that sparkle like obsidian” “something not quite human about him but also very welcoming”
answer: I know who you’re talking about! I think his name is Oremid Hass and I’m pretty sure he’s an Earth Genasi! :)

reblog.comment: I know who you’re talking about! I think his name is Oremid Hass and I’m pretty sure he’s an Earth Genasi! :)

trail.content_raw: I know who you’re talking about! I think his name is Oremid Hass and I’m pretty sure he’s an Earth Genasi! :)

summary: Sign-ups are now OPEN! They’ll stay open until the 31st January, so hurry up and get your application in before then! We’re...
caption:
Sign-ups are now OPEN!

They’ll stay open until the 31st January, so hurry up and get your application in before then! We’re looking for fic writers, fan poets, filkers… if you produce written fandom work, we’re looking for you to contribute to the zine! Check out the guidelines and FAQ on our blog and then follow the above link to sign up!

summary: I’m somehow caught up with Critical Role once again! Here’s my take on Dashilla to celebrate! --- And just a low-key reminder...
caption:
I’m somehow caught up with Critical Role once again! Here’s my take on Dashilla to celebrate!

—
And just a low-key reminder that due to factors that are probably known to all by now, I am largely inactive on Tumblr and post more on other sites. So here’s some links:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Wuggynaut
Artstation: https://www.artstation.com/wuggy
DeviantArt: https://www.deviantart.com/wuggynaut

tags: I'm just... not down with this
summary: anyways if anyone wants to join me in tweeting the official CR account/replying to their tweet to point out how whitewashed Beau...
body:
anyways if anyone wants to join me in tweeting the official CR account/replying to their tweet to point out how whitewashed Beau is in the new official merch art, please do, the more people point it out the more likely they are to address it

EDIT: They’re going to change it before the pre-orders ship!!!

reblog.comment:
anyways if anyone wants to join me in tweeting the official CR account/replying to their tweet to point out how whitewashed Beau is in the new official merch art, please do, the more people point it out the more likely they are to address it

blog.name: bixbiboom
blog.title: I myself am also Enchanter Pumat Sol
blog.description:
Bixbi, older than you.

Fat queer of indeterminate origin.

Possibly a lesser demon.

Hellenist serving Hestia, Hermes and Chiron.

Critical Role has taken over my life and my blog.

Taliesin Jaffe is my boyfriend.

I love you.

#eyesnevershut
